name: Snow Fort Defense
description:
Protect your snow base from incoming attacks. Snow Fort Defense is an arcade type game in which you throw snowballs at enemies trying to destroy your snow fortress. The longer you can resist the attacks, the harder the game will get. Go for a high-score and challenge others. Just remember to keep stocking on snowballs before you run out.

Controls & Instructions
  • Keyboard arrows - Throw snowball in that direction.
  • Spacebar - Collect snow to make more snowballs. (Press 5 times to make 1 snowball)
  • Enter - Start the game or go back to title screen after game over.

Enemies will appear from either up, down, left, or right. Use your snowballs to defeat incoming attacks before they reach your base in the center. Your life and amount of snowballs are displayed on the top left of the screen. The bar below the amount of snow balls indicates how much snow you have collected. Fill up that bar to get extra snow balls to throw. The longer you survive, the higher the level of the game and aggressiveness of attacks.

Controls can be customized in the downloadable version.
